from sortedcontainers import SortedList
class Solution:
    def shortestDistanceAfterQueries(self, n: int, queries: List[List[int]]) -> List[int]:
        res = []
        cj = n - 1
        sl = SortedList()
        for a, b in queries:
            cur = sl.bisect_left((a, 0))
            if cur > 0 and sl[cur - 1][1] >= b:
                res.append(cj)
                continue
            while cur < len(sl) and sl[cur][1] <= b:
                #print(cur)
                cj += sl[cur][1] - sl[cur][0] - 1
                sl.pop(cur)
            if cur >= len(sl) or sl[cur][0] >= b:
                sl.add((a, b))
                cj -= b - a - 1
            #print(a, b, sl)
            res.append(cj)
        return res
